article.title: The Development, Cost, and Impact of a Current Awareness Service in anIndustrial Town
article.author: Bowman, C.M.Brown, M.T.
article.text: The development of a current awareness system in The Dow Chemical Company has resulted in four established services, one based on internal information and the other three on Chemical Abstracts. In addition several other services are now being tried or considered. The operation of such a service is expensive, but the willingness of the user to pay for it and responses to a survey indicate that it is a useful and worthwhile tool to the scientist and engineer. The use of such services also has a significant effect on other established information services.
